column10: Tola dze; mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam wɔ hɔn mbasantsen mu: hɔn dodow wɔ David ne nda no mu no ɔyɛ mpemeduonu ebien na ahaesia."

column2: "Na Uzi ne ba nye Izrahia; na Izrahia ne mba nye; Maekɛl
column6: beenum: hɔn nyinara nyimpa etsitsir a."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee no
column6: mpemeduasa esia: na wɔwɔ yernom na mba pii."

column2: "Na hɔn nuanom a wɔwɔ Isakar ebusua ebusua nyinara mu
column3: mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam no
column4: wobuu hɔn ano dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ananakan tse no

column8: mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam; na wɔkaan hɔn ananakan do mpemeduonu ebien na eduasa anan."

column10: na Alemet. Woyinom nyinara Beker ne mba a."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efiefi tsetsee
column5: mpemduesuon ahaenu a wotum fir edzi kedzi ako wɔ dɔm mu."

column2: "Supim na Huppim yɛ Ir ne mba
column3: na Husim yɛ Aher ne ba."

column2: "Manaasɛ mba; Asriel a ne yer woo no no: (no nwewe Aramnyi no woo Gilead n'egya Makir:"
"na Makir waar Huppim na Supim akyerɛbaa a ne dzin dze Maaka;) na nyia otsia ebien no ne dzin dze Zelofehad: na Zelofehad nyaa mbabaa."
"Na Makir ne yer Maaka woo babanyin
column3: na ɔfrɛɛ ne dzin Peres; na no nuabanyin dzin dze Seres; na ne mba nye Ulam na Rakem."

column2: "Na Ulam ne ba nye Bedan. Woyinom fi Gilead

column5: na Elead a Gat mbarimba a wɔwoo hɔn wɔ asaase no do no kunkum hɔn
column6: osiandɛ wɔkɔree dɛ worukowia hɔn mbowakuw akɔ."

column2: "Na hɔn egya Efraim gyaam hɔn nda pii
column3: na no nuanom baa dɛ wɔrebɛkyekye no werɛ."

column6: osiandɛ mbusu na ɔbaa ne fie."

column2: "Na ne babaa nye Seera a ɔkyekyeer Bɛt-horon anaafo na etsifi
"Efraim ne ba kor so nye Refa a n'asefo nye Resef
"Na hɔn egyapadze na hɔn tsenabew nye Bɛtɛl na no ho nkuroba
column5: nye no ho nkuroba; Sekem so na no ho nkuroba
column6: dze kodu Azza na no ho nkuroba;"
Dor na no nkuroba. Iyinom mu na Israel ne ba Josef n'asefo tsenae."

column3: na Malkiel a ɔyɛ Birzait n'egya no."

column4: na Ashvat. Woyinom nye Jaflɛt ne mba."

column2: "Na no nua Helem mba nye; Zofa

column4: mbarimba akatakyi a wɔyɛ ndam a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn
column5: mbapɔmba mu etsitsir. Na hɔn dodow wobu ano dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ananakan tse a
column6: wotu ɔsa a wɔyɛ mbarimba mpemeduonu esia."
